analysis.description:
BaseCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#360-400) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#383-385)

BaseCrowdsale.pauseToken (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#403-407) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.pause() (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#405)

BaseCrowdsale.unpauseToken (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#407-414) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.unpause() (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#413)

BaseCrowdsale.finish (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#420-427) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(bankAddress,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#425-427)

PrivatePlacement.allocateInternalWallets (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol#483-485) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(foundersAddress,initialFoundersAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol)
	-token.transfer(supportAddress,initialSupportAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol)
	-token.transfer(bountyAddress,initialBountyAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x1b957dc4aefeed3b4a2351a6a6d5cbfbba0cecfa.sol)
